text: Tusim isa imarata vica kade vi kharhe na hona. Ham, jisa masajida di ninha pahile hi dina tom takave bhava raba la'i rakhi ga'i hai. Uha isa yoga hai ki tusim isa vica khare hovo?Isa vica ajihe loka hana jo pavitara rahita (rahini) nu pasada karade hana ate alaha pavitara rahina vali'am nu pasada karada hai
